snippet.title: Blocky Roads - Google Play Trailer (HD)
snippet.description:
Discover green hills, snowy mountains and desert dunes in this unique blocky adventure!

Story:

The hurricane ripped your farm apart and scattered it around the Globe. Jump into your car and collect the missing parts to restore the farm to its former glory!

Official Site: http://dogbytegames.com/blocky_roads.html

Choose one of the 9 cars or build your own block by block!

Main Features:
- 12 tracks to conquer
- 4 challenge tracks to test your skills
- 9 awesome vehicles
- Car Editor! Build and Paint Your own car (Unlocks after track 3)
- Customizable character
- Beautiful Voxel Graphics
- GameCenter integration

Roll with us on FaceBook for more info!
http://www.facebook.com/BlockyRoads
